title: President Donald J. Trump Will Rebuild American Infrastructure and Forge a Path Towards Greater Prosperity – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
January 30, 2018
As we rebuild our industries, it is also time to rebuild our crumbling infrastructure.
						President Donald J. Trump					AMERICA’S INFRASTRUCTURE NEEDS HELP: American infrastructure has fallen behind due to years of inaction and a broken permitting system.REBUILDING AMERICA: President Donald J. Trump’s plan will renew our country’s once-great infrastructure and help build a more prosperous future for all Americans.BUILDING OFF OF YEAR ONE: President Trump will continue to build off of the action his Administration took in its first year to improve American infrastructure.
